item.title: Python: expect the unexpected
item.description: I’ve not really had much of a play with Python 3, but I’m aware of some of its differences. Yesterday I found out about a difference that took me by surprise. Enough of a surprise that I felt the urge to write this post. Opinion Divided What surprised me was how / has changed in Python 3. In Python 2.7 it returns the result of the division of two numbers. >>> 8/2 4 >>> 10/3 3 Checks out to me.
